Package com.irurueta.server.commons.email

This package contains classes related to sending emails. The main classes of this package are: - EmailSender: to send emails - EmailMessage: which contains the email data: text, subject, attached files, etc. Different implementations of these classes exist providing different behaviors (i.e. text emails only, emails with attachments, HTML emails etc). Currently JavaMail, Amazon SES and Apache Mail are supported but further implementations can be added to support other providers. MailConfigurationFactory contains all the properties to be used during configuration so that the system knows how to send emails (i.e. server, credentials, etc).
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MailConfiguration
    Interface defining parameters to configure email sending.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApacheMailHtmlEmailMessage
    Class to build emails having HTML markup as in webpages using Apache Mail.
    ApacheMailSender
    Class to send emails using Apache mail.
    ApacheMailTextEmailMessage
    Class containing a text only email message to be sent using Apache Mail.
    ApacheMailTextEmailMessageWithAttachments
    Class containing a text only email message that can contain file attachments and is meant to be sent using Apache Mail.
    AWSEmailSenderCredentials
    This class defines the credentials used by Amazon SES to send emails.
    AWSHtmlEmailMessage
    Class to build emails having HTML markup as in webpages using Amazon SES.
    AWSMailSender
    Class to send emails using Amazon Web Services (AWS) SES.
    AWSTextEmailMessage
    Class containing a text only email message to be sent using Amazon SES.
    AWSTextEmailMessageWithAttachments
    Class containing a text only email message that can contain file attachments and is meant to be sent using Amazon SES.
    BaseAttachment
    Base class to be used for attachments.
    BuildInfo
    Contains build data for this library.
    EmailAttachment
    Contains information related to an email file attachment.
    EmailMessage<E>
    Abstract base class defining basic Email message data.
    EmailSender<E>
    Base class in charge of sending emails.
    HtmlEmailMessage<E>
    Abstract class to build emails having HTML markup as in webpages.
    InlineAttachment
    Contains information related to an inline email attachment.
    JavaMailHtmlEmailMessage
    Class to build emails having HTML markup as in webpages using Java Mail.
    JavaMailSender
    Class to send emails using JavaMail.
    JavaMailTextEmailMessage
    Class containing a text only email message to be sent using JavaMail.
    JavaMailTextEmailMessageWithAttachments
    Class containing a text only email message that can contain file attachments and is meant to be sent using JavaMail.
    MailConfigurationFactory
    Class in charge of loading and configuring the email sending layer.
    MailConfigurationImpl
    Class containing configuration to send emails, such as email provider, email server (host, port and credentials) and email address to send emails from.
    TextEmailMessage<E>
    Base class for text only email messages.
    TextEmailMessageWithAttachments<E>
    Base class for text only email messages containing file attachments.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EmailProvider
    Enumerator indicating supported email providers to send emails.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EmailException
    Exception raised if anything fails on the email sending layer.
    MailNotSentException
    Raised if an email couldn't be sent for some reason (wrong configuration, network or SMTP server failure, etc).
    NotSupportedException
    Raised if a given feature is not supported.
